Articles.Content:
ive been using ksp for about 3 months now and have completely stopped using many other simulation software.

For someone lives in huntsville alabama that is into 3d modeling this program is what Ive been waiting for.

If youve been lucky enough to be.using this program for longer than I have ,I look forward to hopefully benefit all

Kerbalkind
Congrats on joining, recruit! Thanks for the desire to excel into space

Welcome to the community Jthomas

I'm glad you are enjoying the game, it's one of the few games of any kind that I just keep going back to and I think that's true of everyone else here as well

Have fun making new parts for KSP and fly safe!
